Summary: Hovering crafts signaling with white, orange and red lights. Other objects asending from space to hovering objects.
divs: sighting detailssitting on back porch, noticed a falling star, the star stopped and hovered. started blinking like a strobe light (white). another object to the west shown a brilliant white light, orange\yellow light and then a red light. this object was hovering and spinning showing the three separate lights as it maneuvered. i will be looking tonight for more activity as last night was just another sighting that has been going on for three weeks.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Coarsegold
There were no other sightings in Coarsegold on or around August 20th 2011
